name: James HARDING (a/k/a Hurly), Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Harding v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: James HARDING (a/k/a Hurly), Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of March, 2008, the above captioned appeal is herewith quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
944 A.2d 752
James HARDING (a/k/a Hurly), Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
No. 17 EAP 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 12, 2008.
